casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darren Wayne GENTLE 240A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 31, 2018 Aaron Thomas Johnson, Assistant Appellate Defender, Joseph E. Elder, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Richard J. Costanza, Attorney at Law, Southern Pines, for Gentle, Darren Wayne.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of August 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of August 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 4th day of October 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
